glsa.title: aview: Insecure temporary file usage
glsa.synopsis: An insecure temporary file usage has been reported in aview, leading to symlink attacks.

background.p: aview is an ASCII image viewer and animation player.

description.p: Dmitry E. Oboukhov reported that aview uses the "/tmp/aview$$.pgm" file in an insecure manner when processing files.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All aview users should upgrade to the latest version:
